title: Interprofessional Collaborative Learning Simulation for Asthma Health Promotion

context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical terminology and team project experience
context.additional_context: Medical, nursing, and pharmacy students collaborate in teams to simulate an asthma management program in a VR environment, facilitating collaborative learning.

learning_goals: Learners understand professional role-specific responsibilities and develop collaborative strategies through an asthma patient education simulation
Learners improve their collaborative attitude score (ATTCT) by 10% or more after completing VR-based team missions
Learners can explain five core components of the adolescent asthma management program (Triple A) in a simulated environment
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
